price: 18.Nummah Yalli xiibiteh Nabii Mucammad israa kee miqraaj bar isi Rabbih astootik kaxxa astooti yubleemil.
arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: laqad raā min āyāti rabbihi al-kub'rā
